content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't be the only one to report this. it's been about twelve years now and although i don't recall the date , i do however recall the incident vividly..
 i was driving my wife at the time in our new jeep to a grand opening of the ikea store in santa ana , must have been 2002. 
as i pulled into the lot, an attendent with directions flash lights was standing in the crosswalk motioning where to park. i thought it odd as he was focused into the southwestern sky above costa mesa. as was the crowd of people standing around him. 
once parked we (the then wife) and i walked through the crosswalk toward the store and up the the attendent where i asked him what every one was stairing at.  he pointed up at the clear sky to what i would describe as three round transparent metal reflective hovering objects , unknown size and distance but judging from the location of the marine layer that moves back in over this area in the afternoon. i'd say somewhere above five hundred feet high, the marine layer hadn't cast shadow yet but the objects would have been near where the low coastal cloud collects.
al the attendent said was "there were four, they went away and three returned"
i observed them for just a few moments before heading into the furnature store.
upon exiting the store the three objects remained in the exact location as they were when i went into the store. motionless. 
my shopping experience, near an hour. but the lot attendent must have observed them and the missing counterpart for much longer.
content.summary: lot attendent was focused on objects, when i asked what every one was looking at he pointed and said there were four, they left and three returned, upon exiting the store they remained where .

content.detailedDescription: Observed in daylight, noticed craft while walking; it hovering over south community college in west seattle(not a satellite, no flaring). hovering high in the sky for over 10 minutes then drifting in irregular path to stop and hover. object stayed relatively over the same area, in the sky for about 40 minutes until it became covered from site, by a small cloud.
content.summary: Observed in clear sky, silver orb irregular path and long hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a car show in vinton, virginia, on 27 april, 2014,at approximately 13:45, at the vinton war memorial, 814 washington ave, vinton, va.
when i returned home, i was editing the photographs that i had taken at the event. in the top right-hand corner one of the photographs, i saw a small rectangular object. 

i did not see this when i took the picture, as i was focused on the car i was photographing. it did not look like a bug, or anything stuck to the lens. 

it only showed up in the one photograph. i enlarged the image in the area of the object to get a closer look. 

the object was rectangular with what looks like a protrusion from one side. the object was west or northwest of my position. 

i have attached the original photo, and two cropped (enlarged area)copies of the same photo for ease of seeing the object.
content.summary: After taking photos at car show, i found an object in photo i had taken.

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped out the house to have a smoke and noticed the bright object followed by a (i think) jet aircraft.  elevation unknown.  i ran back into the house and grabbed my camera to see if i could get a photo.  both the craft and the aircraft continued in a straight line to the se.  feelings?  curious. lost both behind the trees in the back yard.  with the 2 photo's i hope you can either tell me it was a normal aircraft, or another ufo.
content.summary: Glowing  sphere folloed by a (i think jet plane)

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking thru the woods south of lemont going to a friend's house
when i heard talking in a language i had never heard before. about 20 yards
farther i saw dim multicolored lights. i entered a small clearing and saw
the craft. there were several "people" working on it. there were several
panels opened and "they" (i saw then that there were 4) were working on the
craft. i stood there for about 5 min watching before one of them saw me.
i didn't know what to do so i high tailed away from there and went back
to my house. i told my father about what i had just seen and he seemed
unusually unconcerned. he then told me about something he encountered during
wwii in the south pacific, i frankly found it hard to believe, but considering what i had just witnessed it sounded plausible.
i went back to that clearing to watch. "they" had closed all of the panels
and were getting in the craft. it closed up and there were no seams or
joins that were visible. the lights brightened up, and it took off. it
vanished out of sight in a matter of seconds. it had to be going about 11
to 15 thousand mph vanish that fast. the next day i was sick to my stomach
and had a what looked like a sunburn. dad rushed me to the hospital where
i was treated for mild radiation exposure. 
i have never related this to anyone but my father for fear of being labeled
as a crazy person.
content.summary: A triangle about 19' across end, 28' along sides about 8' thick with domes about 8' in diameter.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to take my dog to his job, and looked up at sky and saw multiple small objects firing light beams at at each other, mostly one on one type of dog fighting done usually done in jet fighter types of planes. the were all multi-colored objects paired mostly off in pairs or 3 or four objects firing at each other and nearby objects opponents from different armada. this is the third time in the last three month  this has happened in our area. the first two instances ended with an explosion and light show, of which was the  local news and the federal government. the us government claimed that it was a meteorite that had exploded in the atmosphere with one problem on my part. there were first large disc shaped crafts on a diamond shaped  formation from the nw sky to the se sky looking like a compass needle in the shape of the formation. it crossed the main x-y axis on the compass almost perfectly over my house which is a north south orientations. end too end and east-west front to back. the reports of peopls witnesses reported to ky3 along the shooting line of sight and at the end where the explosion. it can be confirmed by looking w;ocal tv station and look under the weather segments for month of may, they had a diagram of the reports. there was  jet at high altitude and i could not identify the type of jet, psossibility thatt was the araura spy plane. i have seen it my area on several occasions. two were while ufo objects were firing at each other. i will keep my ears and eyes open over the next few days to something haooens.
content.summary: 30-40 objects seen firing at each other in sky overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was wish several friends at table rock lake, we observed a craft for several hours changing shapes lit up with multi colored lights with a bluish strobe light on top reflecting off a metallic surface. quite bizarre.
content.summary: Viewed with friends for 4 hours

content.detailedDescription:
I drove into anderson park just after 1 a.M. for a park check as part of routine patrol in the area as a police officer. as i began driving towards the back i see 5 or 6 lights; 2 red, 2 blue, and 2 green, or it was 2 red, 3 blue, and 1 green. the lights were near a tree line on the other side of a softball field and about 150 yards away. the lights were clustered around each other at various heights in a kind of oval shape. i would estimate the lights were clustered around something the size of a car and were about 3 feet away from each other. the lights looked like led quality light and were as bright as car headlights, not moving, and each light was about the size of a softball. as i drove into the park the lights do not change in intensity or move like a directional light would as you move a flashlight around. as i drove i observed the lights from about the 5 o'clock to the 4 o'clock position covering about 50 yards and there was no change in intensity of the light or any idea as a direction they were pointing; thus giving me the impression they were some kind of dome light or spherical in nature. i could not see any beams of light that lit up the grass or trees around it like a car headlight would do. i looked at this for about 5 seconds and then all of a sudden the lights go out simultaneously. to clarify, there is no way the light was emitted from separate sources. the lights went out at exactly the same time and had to have been controlled from a single source.

i call this out on the police radio saying that i was going to check the park as i had just seen some strange lights. the radio works just fine. i go check the area and observe that the trees and grass are frosted over with freezing dew and i could see my breath. the low that night was 52 so it was probably about 55 degrees, possibly lower due to the proximity of nearby clear creek. i did not observe this frost anywhere else in the city that night and i was near another water source in a different part of town about, about two miles away and one hour earlier and did not observe the frosting of the vegetation. i turned on my spotlight and could see what appeared to be snow falling in the beam of my light and remember thinking, "is it snowing? no it's too warm. is this ash from a forest fire? no there's no fire and i don't smell smoke."

i then walked onto the freshly frosted grass and see no signs of disturbance on the grass. there is a bike path near there so i go to the bike path and turn off my flashlight and stand still for about 20 seconds to see if i can hear anything (like kids laughing). as i am standing in the half-moon light my hand goes to my gun and i think to my self slowly, "i'm gonna go back to my car." it wasn't a physical feeling that made me uneasy but not knowing what i was dealing with made me feel vulnerable.

i went back to my patrol car and throughout the night parked nearby to see if the lights came back and they never did. i went back to the area just as the sun was coming up and did not observe any signs on the ground and the vegetation was no longer frosted.

the only rational explanation i can think of is that there were these lights on an atv on the bike path, but they were arranged asymmetrically and did not appear to be directional. but i would imagine i would have seen the lights move as the atv drove down the bike path or heard the vehicle driving away. furthermore, the path goes into the trees and driving an atv as fast as it would have to have gone for me to not hear it would be insane without lights. there was a traffic signal about 50 yards behind me but the colors i saw were different hues than traffic signal colors and i have driven that area at that time a hundred times and never seen this. there was no water on my windshield and it was too clear to be a reflection.
content.summary: 6 colored lights, red, blue, green; asymetrically around an oval pattern the size of a car, hovering, dissapeared simultaneously, seen at 100 yards

content.detailedDescription: This morning ,june 19,2014,my wife an myself were driving on route 159, north of bunkerhill ,il.It was about one mile south of the intersection with route 16.We were heading north, i was traveling about 50 mph.The time was 10:41 am cdt.I know this because i had just checked the time on the truck radio,when my wife asked what the white thing was in the sky about 300 yards west of us at just above an behind the tree line.She thought at first it was a cell phone tower but that tower is a mile to the north.I immediatly slowed to look.The sky was very clear some broken clouds in are,where the object was located it was very clear an no clouds near by.There was no sound or movement to the object,the sun was up an there was a glint of sun off of the object,though it was very white ,almost like polished porcelan.As we passed the object it appeared to be on the other side of the tree line ,maybe at the tree tops or just below,as we passed we could see the object still between the different branches.I stopped the truck an turned around to see if we could tell exactly what it was,which only took about 30 sec.When we got back to that place it was no were to be found.I proceeded south on route 159.To the next country road about 150 yards an turned west.Passing the tree line it opened to corn an bean fields,no trees to the west or south.Some to the north about a mile away at royal lakes subdivision.The view  we had was about ten miles to the west an south.There was no trace of that craft anywhere.It vanished period.I would estimate the craft to be about 20 to 30 feet long,with no wings or tail fin,the front or south end of craft was thinner than the tail or north end,it seemed to have a raised area half the length of the craft. i feel we were viewing it from the side.It appeared to be abouit 20 degrees abouve the horizon as best as i can judge.Having never witnessed anything like that in 68 years,the hole thing lasted maybe two minutes.I must sayi have seen many strange sites over the years in the sky an at sea in the navy but nothing to compare to today.
content.summary: White solid object ,south end thinner than north end,no wings or tail fin

content.detailedDescription:
Several of us were at lake mission viejo, ca, when we saw a bright light in the eastern sky at 10:30 pm.  this light was hovering and moving slowly to the south. this light would disappear and reappear in a different spot on several occasions. the most we saw at the same time was 2.

i started video around 10:30 pm on june 18, 2014.  this is a compilation of several videos i took over approx 30 minutes. the lights were in the eastern sky from my location. the horizontal row of lights are the street lights of a nearby residential area on a hill.
content.summary: Lights would appear then disappear, only to reappear in different location.

content.detailedDescription: On 06/19/2014, at approximately 12:42pm, i was driving home, i came to a red traffic light and observed a white object in the sky through the power lines. at first i thought it was an airplane, but i noticed that it wasn't moving like an airplane should. the object kept changing direction and shape unlike an airplane and moved very slow. i then pulled over and parked my car at a near gas station and pulled out my iphone. as i was trying to record the object, i notice that while it was moving i could see 2-3 smaller orb like objects flying around the big object. the objects traveled from north to south. i don't  think it was plastic bags or balloons.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large orb with 2-3 smaller orbs

content.detailedDescription: Initially thought it was a low flying helicopter over the atlantic ocean with it's path obscured by clouds but then multiple lights appeared and it seemed to hover then blink forward.  so we grabbed the video camera and zoomed in when they appeared again.
content.summary: Ufo over atlantic ocean viewed from motel at topsail beach

content.detailedDescription:
last night on june 17, 2014, approximately 9:15 pm central time i was standing in my back yard with my dog, and i looked up and saw two lights in the far distance, in the south east portion of the sky. i usually check out the moon and any interesting stars at night, so when i saw those two, i was very surprised to see that they were not white lights, but deep golden. the far back one was just a tiny dot moving toward my direction, coming at an angle, going north west. the slightly larger one was slightly off to the actual right side of the farther back light. both were deep golden lights.  

at first i thought that i was seeing two very bright satellites, but they were moving so quickly toward me, growing larger, so  i  quickly stepped inside my door and grabbed my dad��s former naval  binoculars .

looking thru the binoculars i could see there was a large cluster of the golden lights that looked like they were tucked under the objects, which appeared to have  an oblong shape.  the lights were extremely bright, and very gold. the first one was moving toward a small cluster of clouds, where the outside of the clouds were very thin and whispy.  

then the lead object moved behind the whispy outside of the clouds, and i was surprised that i could only see one faded gold light, since that part of the clouds was very thin, and i had the binoculars. 

 i was watching for it to come out from the cloud, and was completely taken off guard to see a ��flat cloudy perfectly round shape with no lights at all�� come out !  i watched the circle move quickly across the sky, toward me, closer but at the same height, and could not believe i was watching a ��circle�� flying across the sky.  when i took my binoculars down for a second..I could not see the actual object, just  a tiny bit of movement, but when i used them again, i could see the circle. no lights. 

i have a sketch i am drawing, and will scan and send very shortly. caj
the circle would best be described by saying it closely resembled the ��blob/circle�� that is used to disguise a person��s face on television when the identity of a person��s face  was not to be seen.
although this circle was perfectly formed, as was the others.

page two

i looked back and saw the second object entering the same section of the cloud, and the identical thing happened, with me watching it having turned into the flat cloudy like circle as well, and flying at a  fairly good speed, going the same direction of north west.  

 i looked back again, and saw one more object with the golden lights heading toward the clouds, go in , and yes, the same thing happened. as i looked at the third one, i also saw two other lights in the distance, but did not see what they did, as i turned my attention on the two still within distance to watch, no lights..Just two more circles flying across the sky.  when i looked back and up, i did not find the last two of the five i saw.  

i stayed out there a few more minutes, but i did not see any more of the objects. 

i spent a lot of time trying to reason it out, but i do know that any type of plane has to have lights on them to fly at night, even a hot air balloon can��t go up. these lights just went out behind that cloud. and with out the binoculars  i would not have seen the circles.  

i looked for a place to report it��.I was back inside by  9:30, and ended up calling channel 58/cbs news about 10:30 pm..But was just basically blown off.  

i left a message with  mufon/ california, but nobody called me today. 

then tonight i called nuforc, hoping to have someone talk to me about this. i have heard reports, but never a description of the gold lights..And certainly not the flying circles��
content.summary: Five separate object/cluster of bright gold belly lights/turned int  to circle/no  lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my sofa watching television around 10:30 p.M.  i have an approximate 100 degree view outside my living room window and sit on top of a knoll in murrieta, ca.  i happened to look out the window and noticed a very bright orange light just above the tree line and over the distant hills (sw from my home).  at first i thought it must be an airplane that was coming directly at me because the light was getting brighter. but the longer i watched it the more i realized that it wasn't moving.  it was just hovering in place.  

at that point, i jumped up and got my binoculars and began to watch it.  what looked like a solid, bright orange light with the naked eye looked like a spider web of orange light when magnified.  it changed shape several times . . . became larger and more web like, smaller and flattened and surrounded by a halo.  at times, there seemed to be a solid vertical bar of light running down the middle with web-like lighting to the sides of the vertical bar.  twice, it just disappeared (poof, gone . . . to reappear almost instantly)and then it reappeared and there were two, one hovering above the other.  

during my 30 minutes of observation, two lights appeared twice with one disappearing each time and leaving one.  they did not move (dart across the sky; did not appear to be leaving a trail; made no sound).  i went outside with my binoculars twice to look at it (them) and moved to various windows within my home to observe. 

i also got on the internet to see if anyone else was observing with me and, so far, have not found anything on the net that mirrors my experience on june 18, 2014.  but i did find several similar sightings in the area over the past four years.

i'm new to the area (been living here two months) so i'm not well acquainted with the geographical locations around me.  i do know that camp pendleton is south and west of where i live and this sighting could have been some type of night maneuvers.  i've also been told that there are night parachute jumps at times.  however, these lights did not descend and behaved quite abnormally . . . which is why i've found this site and am reporting it.  (sorry that i did not take any photos.) 

finally, at almost exactly 11 p.M., the last light, poof, disappeared and never returned.  i checked periodically until after midnight. just weird! :-)

i see i can attach a drawing.  here it is!
content.summary: Two bright orange lights at treetops over murrieta, ca, june 18, 2014

content.detailedDescription:
Walked into back yard and just happened to look up at the sky. i observed what looked like a tube white in color with the middle of the object seemed to have a solar panel each 180 degrees apart and silver type center each 90 degree. the objects appeared to rotate cylindrical spin then u could see panel go from black to silver then black again!

i thought of a satellite but 5 in a row spaced by 5 minute intervals and the last craft appeared to be glowing reddish haze. they appeared in sets of two and seemed to be about 5 minutes apart for the second set and then within 5 minutes the same type craft with reddish haze outline spaced exactly like the previous two pairs.

if it were not for the reddish/orange glow of the 5 th craft i would like to think they were some type of communications satellite's but 5 and 1 colored following the same path exactly and so close together. their speed was slower than any aircraft could maintain lift from. no trails, noise etc. completely silent. did anyone else see these last night? my friend a i took pics but the camera does not expand or enlarge enough to see the crafts. maybe they could be enhanced?
content.summary: Tube like craft with solar panels in the middle it looked like

content.detailedDescription: Two bright lights appeared to be hovering in the air with little movement other than small side to side movements. lasted for approximately 10 minutes then disappeared.
content.summary: Hovered for 10 minutes with minute side to side movements.

content.detailedDescription: Orange glowing sphere east of aliso viejo, ca. stationary, did not move in the sky.
content.summary: Glow orange sphere, stationary.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my girlfriend to her house in r.S.M. i saw a big glowing light over a hilltop in the distance ahead of us. brighter than any light possible. we drove around the hill to get a closer look. it seemed to have moved further out in the distance. we pulled over next to the road where we saw 5 other people watching the same thing. (as we were standing there people kept driving up to see the same thing). there seemed to be a little bit of a green light coming of the top of it. it seemed to be saucer shaped with antenna or something coming off the top to emit the green light.  when we pulled up a second one appeared a little higher just to the left of it. the ufos were glowing extremely bright and slowly pulsating in brightness. we watched for about 20 minutes as both would randomly go dark and reappear and pulsate. decided to give up and drive home after both went dark and were no longer visible. as we got to my house atop a big hill we looked out in the distance towards the beach and could see 2 extremely large mother ships.  it couldn't have been anything else because they had very bright white lights on the side of them in a row. one had 5 white lights and a little green one on the end just below the far right white light.  the spot where we saw the ufos was just over the hill in the cleveland national forest area just east of rancho santa margarita, california. can pinpoint on map if needed to.
content.summary: Two big slowly pulsating very bright saucers with tiny green light coming off top

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a trip with my scout troop, we had just left the appomattox battlefield an hour previous en route to our campsite for the night. we became lost and stopped in the parking lot of the roses to consult a map of the area. we were standing outside the vehicles conversing when one of the leaders exclaimed, "hey look over there!" at which point we focused our attention to the sky behind the store. there in the sky well over the tree tops appeared a solid grey/dull silver spherical object that appeared to be hovering and revolving in a clockwise fashion. we continued to watch the object for approximately 7 to 8 minutes, at which point the object began to slowly drift in a southerly direction. it never changed altitude during this drift and maintained this course for an estimated distance of 200 to 300 yards before coming to a halt. at this point it began slowly drifting toward our location in the parking lot while slowly descending. i suspect that even at this point it was still quite distant given the fact that we observed this behavior for approximately a minute without the object approaching the area i perceived to be directly behind the store. after a minute of this course the object stopped abruptly and then accelerated rapidly from a dead stop and headed directly into the clouds straight above after which it was not seen again. i've never seen an object move as fast as that sphere did that day. it did not emit any sound, light or other discernible sensory characteristics. though the exterior appeared dull some sun light seemed to reflect off of it. the exterior appeared to be smooth with the exception of two slightly raised hexagonal protrusions on opposing sides of the upper hemisphere of the object. 
i can't speak for my companions but i was transfixed on the object during the event. i felt that it was one of the most unusual things that i'd ever seen and the whole experience was slightly unsettling. after the object disappeared we left the area and headed to the campsite.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed a spherical object hovering in the distance over the roses.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home i noticed a light in the sky at first glance thought it was an airplane but once i glanced again i knew it was something more. it esentially looked like a street lamp above the horizon. it literally made me stop in the street untill cars behind me were honking. as i continued  to drive home i put it in the back of my  mind but curiosity got ahold of me so i went to a higher aarea of my suburban neighborhood to search for the strange ob once again. i remembered where in the sky i saw the fire ball first but couldn't see it due to houses and wildlife obstructing my view. i knew there was one area in my neighborhood i would be able to see the potential ufo at the top of po, a street in my neighborhood, and there it was. brighter than before. i drove across the main street, alicia parkway, to get to the other side of po. as i drove down the hill i parked at po park and could see it clearly. i looked to the left and the street lamp was the exact same color, brightness, and size as the orb in the sky. an exact replica virtually. as i continued to star i noticed it was sort of flashing/flaring and as it did with every flash it got dimmer. but this happened real rapidly. the fireball in the sky was at its brightest and within thirty seconds it was gone. was this a exploding star i don,t know. maybe i should go back to school.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky disappeared withim ten minutes. very bright and vivid the just gone

content.detailedDescription:
Saw object first while driving on 5 fwy south.  appeared as bright, solid light bigger than helicopter lights.  no red or flashing light like helicopter or airplane would have.  

as we got closer to home, light appeared to be over cleveland national forest.  as we watched it got bigger, smaller and bigger again a number of times.  then, a second light appeared.  both lasted approximately 10 seconds together.  then first light went out and second stayed lit.  it too pulsated in size.  

we live north of camp pendleton, so it could possibly be military flair in sky.  neither object moved.  they did appear to burn out rather than move anywhere.
content.summary: One light that pulsated in size.  then another and first appeared to burn out.

content.detailedDescription: My significant other and i were outside doing landscaping work. i looked up to the sky and thought about how clear hey were and wondered how well i could see a ufo from the vantage point i had. i searched the sky for a second and instantly saw a blinking light. it was reflecting a light or pulsating light. mostly white and sometimes blue. it seemed transparent. my other half witnessed this as well. i started to film this event and have watched the fil in awe to find i captured not one ufo but possibly three!
content.summary: I have it on video.  2-3 different ufos. thought of ufo, looked up and saw one

content.detailedDescription: Just a light consistent speed , not an airplane or helicopter . ive seen millions of them, moved slowly and consistanly then dissapered, 1=2 min later high flying plaine with 2 blinking lights came frome other direction but was to late . light went out as though hiding
content.summary: Ot on back porch facing portland yellow /gold light flew silent  ffrom vancouver over columbia river over airport portland then light went out , then plane high in the sky headed toward vancouver from west  2 min to late

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the garbage, i have a habit to look up and look at the
stars. i notice a semi bright object high enough to say "high orbit
altitude", at first i thought it was a satellite coming from the
south towards the north and coming from the east was another object
almost looking like as if it was going to collide or intercept the first
object that was traveling northwards. at this time i called my wife and see walk outside towards me and notice the 2 objects i was looking at and out of no where appeared a third object but looked as if it was at a higher
orbit but a slower speed which was obviously a satellite, the first and second objects changed direction towards each other light twin stars that came together,changed direction and moved away from each other, the first object now headed northwest and the east bound second object went southwest, i was relieved that my wife saw the same thing i did so that proves to me that my observations and conclusions were not just my imagination, as we continued to look they both faded out of sight.
content.summary: Observed 2 high orbit objects that changed direction abruptly.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I went to check on my aunt's dogs when i went outside the were barking at the south direction.The object was bright and had a gray/lead surface with blinking lights i could see windows with et's in the window i flashed a flashlight at the object and i got a sudden headache and started getting dizzy. 

the next day, i called my uncle if he has experienced this encounter he said 'he has and he reported it to mufon' so i finally decided to report it which i am doing now
content.summary: Bright object observed at night.

content.detailedDescription: My two sons and i were setting out on the deck watching for ufo's as usual and noticed an over abundance of aircraft tonight . there were a couple planes that were flying way to high to be a normal commercial flight so we decided to keep our eyes open .Then out of no where a very bright light lit up and started dropping at a very rapid speed . as it was dropping it pulsed some very bright intense light then made an extremely bright light and shot straight back up and disappeared .After seeing this we noticed a few other very high altitude planes right in the same vicinty as if they were investigating ,the planes were very fast !
content.summary: Looked like giant strobe light in sky the started dropping rapidly getting brighter

content.detailedDescription: Two orange/red lights appeared in the sky above atlantic ocean, they appeared out of no where and hovered for a few minutes, then vanished. i was sitting on my oceanfront balcony around 9pm on 6/11/14 in north myrtle beach, sc near the sea cabin fishing pier and noticed this event right in front of my face, with no explanation. the next night, my husband and i saw another similar event, only one light that time. i thought it was a plane's lights about to fly over, but it never went anywhere, it just dissipated into thin air, with no sound. i couldn't believe my own eyes and i want to know what it was!
content.summary: Two orange/red lights in sky above ocean appeared out of no where and hovered for a few minutes, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i was in wake forest on the a new piece of highway that was recently opened, i was facing a town called bunn, nc. i was messing with my radio, then looked straight ahead and seen a gold colored "craft" that at first glance i thought was a hot air balloon. only reason i thought it was a balloon is because the area i was facing (bunn, nc) is know to give hot air balloon rides, i seen the object for about 3-4 seconds, since i thought it was a hot air balloon i looked down back at my radio, then said to my self, wait that hot air balloon is huge, there's no way its a balloon, so i looked back at the craft and it was gone, when i say this thing was huge, im not joking it was far away and still took up a lot of my viewing area in the sky. also it resembled a old time submarine. the skies were clear, no clouds in sight, and to this date i have never seen the object again, but have seen multiple hot air balloons, but they have never match the crafts description, im sure others had to have seen this object, it was the biggest thing i have ever seen in the skies, and it was gone within 1-2 secs of first seeing it, afterwards i kept saying "no way" no way" i rode another 10-12 miles to my buddies house without the radio on, just thinking i seen my first object that i couldn't tell what it was, of course my friends didn't believe me at first, but im not a liar or a thief, my word is solid. i hope this helps, would love to know what that object was. i wish i could tell you more but i just seen it for maybe 3 seconds, the color and size is what stood out to me the most, and it was just sitting still ( as far as i could tell, i do believe the object was near bunn, nc) about 12-15 miles from my location
content.summary: Huge gold color "blimp" at first glance, thought it was a hot air ballon

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk on the beach, and saw some weird lights, but didnt pay attention to detail and just figured that it was a plane... about 5 minutes later- when sitting with my family on the deck (on the beach) we all saw it. 11 witnesses to the 4/5 blinking lights over the ocean. thy moved randomly and quickly. the lights blinked at random times, but when they did blink, it was in a sequence. (right to left) they also went out in the same sequence. i know much about flying objects- and i can tell you now, it was not any plane, helicopter, or any legal flying object
content.summary: Was sitting on deck by ocean when it was seen

content.detailedDescription: My grandma was driving me to school in october 2013, we were in houston, tx, on the hov lane. while we were driving, we saw a pitch black ufo hovering over the cars, moving slowly. the cars slowed down to look at the huge object. we thought it was like a plane or something, but it couldn't have been. it had no wings. my grandma and i were shocked, we didn't really have any feelings during the seen. we lost sight as we drove away.
content.summary: Pitch black ufo hovering over truck
